The facility does not have a comprehensive written contingency plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment,
transportation, housing, or care of the animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. If an emergency or natural
disaster were to occur at the facility, the lack of a complete written contingency plan could impact animal health if staff are
not prepared to respond to the situation appropriately. Correct by July 5, 2023 by developing, documenting, and following
an appropriate contingency plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, or care of the
animals in the event of an emergency or disaster.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.

transportation, housing, or care of the animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. If an emergency or natural 
disaster were to occur at the facility, the lack of a complete written contingency plan could impact animal health if staff are 
not prepared to respond to the situation appropriately. Correct by July 5, 2023 by developing, documenting, and following 
an appropriate contingency plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, or care of the 
animals in the event of an emergency or disaster. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
